ocaml.in:
let rec listReverse l = 
match l with
| [] -> []
| x::xs -> listReverse xs @ [x]

let rec digitsOfInt n =
let l = [] in
let m = n mod 10 in
match m with
| n -> n::l
| _ -> n::digitsOfInt (n/10)

ocaml.in:
let rec digitalRoot n =
let l = digitsOfInt n in
let x = sumList l in
if x = n then x else digitalRoot x

let rec listReverse l = 
match l with
| [] -> []
| x::xs -> listReverse xs @ [x]

let palindrome w = 
let normal = explode w in
let reverse = listReverse (explode w) in
palinHelper normal reverse

let rec sumList xs = 
match xs with
| [] -> 0
| x::xs -> x + sumList xs
